data.text: @MoHCCZim @UKinZimbabwe @UKaid @NatpharmZ @WHO_Zimbabwe @UNFPA_Zimbabwe Aiwa mabhunu awonkuda kuita sevanerudo vachiita hwegozho kuruma vachifuriridza
@MoHCCZim @UKinZimbabwe @UKaid @NatpharmZ @WHO_Zimbabwe @UNFPA_Zimbabwe When its aid the govt keeps quiet but when they talk abt human rights abuse they told to stay out
@MoHCCZim @UNFPA_Zimbabwe @Emuia Pedzezvo mosimuka muchiti kwamunenge makupa zvipatara "this is a donation by his excellency" hazvisi zvinhu zvabva ku Zanu Pf izvi

“support from the Gvt of Japan under Strengthening Comprehensive Emergency & Obstetric and Neonatal Care in #Covid_19 hotspots,implemented by @MoHCCZim with support from @UNFPA_Zimbabwe will and has already begun saving lives of pregnant women In Zim” said Dr @Emuia https://t.co/q0Vgx0R10K

Ambassador of 🇯🇵to 🇿🇼H.E Mr S. Tanaka, stated how the cold chain equipment is expected to reinforce the country’s cold chain system & ensure #Covid_19 vaccines reach everyone countrywide.Donations include ice-lined & solar driven refrigerators, vaccine carriers & cold boxes https://t.co/4KiaovO0aI
